CustomField.description: Conference - leads from conferences like ACMP Direct Email / Phone - sales driven our team taking action Marketing - emails that come in from the form being filled out online Public Program - Leads from instructors running a public Program Webinar - leads that are generated from hosting a webinar Referral - Referrals are when a client refers another client to us. Registration - leads that come from the public team registration 5/8/23 definitions of the sources jlv
